text: Hara hiɓe habbii si wanaa battane mun ɗen? Ñalnde battane (firo) mayre arata, yejjitunooɓe ɗum ɓen ko adii wi'ay : "Gomɗii Nulaaɓe Joomi amen ɓen addii goonga. Hara tefooɓe no woodani men ɓe tefana men? Maa men ruttee [aduna] men golla ko wanaa ko men gollaaynoo?" Gomɗii ɓe hayrinii wonkiiji maɓɓe ; kon ko ɓe fefindotonoo majjiriɓe
